Boldify - Enhanced Reading for Speed and Focus

Description:

Boldify is a powerful and user-friendly Chrome extension designed to enhance your reading experience. By automatically bolding the first few characters of words based on their length, Boldify makes it easier to quickly scan and comprehend large blocks of text. This unique approach to formatting text not only helps improve speed reading but also provides invaluable support to individuals with attention difficulties, such as those with ADHD.

Key Features:

Automatically bolds the first 2 letters of words with 4 or fewer characters
Bolds the first 3 letters of words with 5 to 7 characters
Bolds the first 4 letters of words with 8 or more characters
Compatible with most websites, providing a seamless browsing experience
Easy-to-use with a simple one-click activation

Whether you're a student, a busy professional, or someone looking for ways to enhance your reading experience, Boldify offers an effective solution. Experience improved focus, concentration, and reading speed with this innovative extension designed to support all types of readers. Transform your browsing experience with Boldify today!
